If your tv is smart tv, chances are it might have support for youtube. Goto YouTube , search for 4k video and play them. While the video is playing, use your remote to open the player ui . There will be a icon in left bottom corner named 4k , highlighted in blue color. This indicates that the video is being played in 4k. Another method is to simply download any 4k video from youtube or any other site, copy them to your pendrive and playback it in your tv.
